subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Michael Jordan, who had been trying to own an N.B.A. team since he retired, settled for a co-ownership position with the Charlotte Bobcats, joining the majority owner Robert L. Johnson.
snippet: Michael Jordan, who had been trying to own an N.B.A. team since he retired, settled for a co-ownership position with the Charlotte Bobcats, joining the majority owner Robert L. Johnson.
